018package org.opengis.metadata.quality;
019
020import org.opengis.annotation.UML;
021import org.opengis.annotation.Classifier;
022import org.opengis.annotation.Stereotype;
023
024import static org.opengis.annotation.Specification.*;
025
026
027/**
028 * Accuracy of the position of features.
029 * Instances should be one of the following subtypes:
030 * <ul>
031 *   <li>{@link AbsoluteExternalPositionalAccuracy}: closeness of reported coordinate values to values accepted as being true;</li>
032 *   <li>{@link RelativeInternalPositionalAccuracy}: closeness of the relative positions of features in a data set
033 *       to their respective relative positions accepted as being true;</li>
034 *   <li>{@link GriddedDataPositionalAccuracy}: closeness of gridded data spatial position values to values accepted as being true.</li>
035 * </ul>
036 *
037 * @author  Martin Desruisseaux (IRD)
038 * @author  Alexis Gaillard (Geomatys)
039 * @version 3.1
040 * @since   2.0
041 */
042@Classifier(Stereotype.ABSTRACT)
043@UML(identifier="DQ_PositionalAccuracy", specification=ISO_19157)
044public interface PositionalAccuracy extends Element {
045}
